properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 v1 v3 v4

verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Jesus is my Saviour,
I shall not be moved;
In His love and favor,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In my Christ abiding,
I shall not be moved;
In His love I’m hiding,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
If I trust Him ever,
I shall not be moved;
He will fail me never,
I shall not be moved,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
I shall not be moved,
Just like a tree that’s
planted by the waters,
Lord, I shall not be moved.
